mapper.update: update user_info set user_name=#{user_name}, user_email=#{user_email}, user_addr=#{user_addr}, user_phone=#{user_phone} where user_id=#{user_id}
mapper.select: select count(*) from coupon where user_id=#{user_id}
select * from (select c.*, rownum rnum from (select * coupon where user_id=#{user_id}) c) where rnum>=#{startRow} and rnum<=#{endRow}
